archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0978
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Billing specialist, we need the ability to be able to provide a customer with a view of additional information on their invoice (e.g. cost centre code) in relation to services on an account OR at account level

properties.value: BS: 1. Where invoices should be created, what type of charges should be included, from subscription model also? 2. Is it possible that there will be mixed model for 1 company? 3. If complex customer has more that one cost centre then billing should create separate invoice for each cost centre (cost centre will be visible on invoice printout)?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
